scripts.dev:build:fresh: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.prod:build:fresh: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache
scripts.backend: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up backend database
scripts.backend:fresh: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up backend database
scripts.frontend: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up frontend
scripts.frontend:fresh: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache frontend && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up frontend
scripts.database: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up database
